sys_script_include.name: AutoPopulateLocation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e34a842093f6021094e3f15a7bba107b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.AutoPopulateLocation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AutoPopulateLocation</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserLocation = Class.create();
GetUserLocation.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getUserLocation: function() {
        var userSysId = gs.getUserID();
        var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        if (user.get(userSysId)) {
            return user.location; // Ensure this is the actual field name in sys_user
        }
        return '';
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>christy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-11 11:25:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>e34a842093f6021094e3f15a7bba107b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoPopulateLocation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e34a842093f6021094e3f15a7bba107b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-13 18:43:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
